bug.short_desc: juk and kscd updates not applicable due to broken dependencies
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
Running 'dnf update' gets "Skipping packages with broken dependencies". With --best option this shows:
Error: nothing provides kde-runtime >= 16.12.2 needed by juk-16.12.2-1.fc25.x86_64. nothing provides kde-runtime >= 16.12.2 needed by kscd-16.12.2-1.fc25.x86_64
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): juk-16.12.2-1.fc25 kscd-16.12.2-1.fc25
Additional info: Originally I thought that some update got delayed in repositories and that the problem will rectify itself; but after few days this seems to persist. I do not know what, not otherwise included in updates, may require the currently installed kde-runtime-16.08.3-4.fc25.

Oops, I didn't intend for autokarma to be enabled for juk/kscd, https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-9fb9fe7621
the dependant one, https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-5b29eb5cbc is still in -testing, but it's looking good, so can probably go to stable soon.

baloo-widgets-16.12.2-1.fc25 dolphin-16.12.2-1.fc25 dolphin-plugins-16.12.2-1.fc25 kate-16.12.2-1.fc25 kde-l10n-16.12.2-1.fc25 kde-runtime-16.12.2-2.fc25 kdelibs-4.14.29-1.fc25 khelpcenter-16.12.2-1.fc25 konsole5-16.12.2-1.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-5b29eb5cbc

baloo-widgets-16.12.2-1.fc25 dolphin-16.12.2-1.fc25 dolphin-plugins-16.12.2-1.fc25 kate-16.12.2-1.fc25 kde-l10n-16.12.2-2.fc25 kde-runtime-16.12.2-2.fc25 kdelibs-4.14.29-1.fc25 khelpcenter-16.12.2-1.fc25 konsole5-16.12.2-1.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-5b29eb5cbc

baloo-widgets-16.12.2-1.fc25, dolphin-16.12.2-1.fc25, dolphin-plugins-16.12.2-1.fc25, kate-16.12.2-1.fc25, kde-l10n-16.12.2-2.fc25, kde-runtime-16.12.2-2.fc25, kdelibs-4.14.29-1.fc25, khelpcenter-16.12.2-1.fc25, konsole5-16.12.2-1.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-5b29eb5cbc

baloo-widgets-16.12.2-1.fc25, dolphin-16.12.2-1.fc25, dolphin-plugins-16.12.2-1.fc25, kate-16.12.2-1.fc25, kde-l10n-16.12.2-2.fc25, kde-runtime-16.12.2-2.fc25, kdelibs-4.14.29-1.fc25, khelpcenter-16.12.2-1.fc25, konsole5-16.12.2-1.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
